Test Case: 
Open the debug perspective
Switch to the Resource perspective
Close the workspace
Open the workspace
Window-->Preferences-->Debug
Change the orientation of the details form.

The debug perspective exists and the variables view is registered as a property 
change listener but the view has not been fully created so the sash bar does 
not exist.

Fixed by changing when the addition of the property change listener occurs.
Please verify.
